item.description:
This will be a very intimate event and will only be open to 2 (two) photographers. It will show 3 but that is because the Meetup website insists I count as 1 (one).


Here is a link to some photos of Sunshine.
Sunshine Photos

We will be shooting 1 set outdoors at dusk and the remainder of the work will be in the studio. There will be about 4 sets and wardrobe changes in a 3-4 hour period.

This event is open to experienced photographers. You should know how to use and control your camera, including F-stop, aperture, ISO, Manual setting, white balance, etc. Even though there will be only 2 photographers, the nature of then event will not allow me time to help with these things. Thanks for your understanding.

If you are available and have been itching to work in this type of setting then this shoot is for you.


NOTE: Your Paypal payment must be received within 24-hours of your RSVP or your RSVP will be automatically canceled. Sorry about the draconian rules but as there are only 2 guests I really can't afford a no-show situation.
item.name: Intimate Night with Sunshine
